XenotypeDef.label: Xyrax Sectoid
XenotypeDef.description: The Xyrax Sectoids are a slender, pale yellow-skinned alien species with a distinct round head, big black eyes, and longer fingers. They possess super-sensitive psychic abilities but have a frail stomach and are sterile. Their green slime blood and unique appearance make them intriguing creatures from another world.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Xyrax Sectoids are slender, pale yellow aliens with round heads, big black eyes, and longer fingers. They have super-sensitive psychic abilities but a frail stomach and are sterile. Their green slime blood and unique appearance make them intriguing extraterrestrial beings.

XenotypeDef.label: Zephyr Sectoid
XenotypeDef.description: Zephyr Sectoids are small, delicate aliens with elongated heads and big, red, human-like eyes. They have green slime blood, slightly longer fingers, and are sensitive to psychic energies. With a frail stomach and sterility, they navigate their unique existence with curiosity and fragility.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Zephyr Sectoids are small, delicate aliens with elongated heads, red human-like eyes, and green slime blood. They possess psychic sensitivity, fragile stomachs, and are sterile, adding to their enigmatic nature.

XenotypeDef.label: Vorix Sectoid
XenotypeDef.description: Vorix Sectoids are small, delicate aliens with rough head shapes, round red eyes, and slate gray skin. They possess innate psychic abilities, fragile stomachs, and green slime blood. Their delicate nature and super sensitivity to psychic energies make them enigmatic beings in the alien world.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Vorix Sectoids are small, delicate aliens with rough head shapes, red eyes, and slate gray skin. They possess psychic abilities, fragile stomachs, and green slime blood, adding to their mysterious nature.

XenotypeDef.label: Hybrid Sectoid
XenotypeDef.description: Hybrid Sectoids have a unique mix of Zephyr, Vorix, and human features in their heads. With big black eyes, green slime blood, and slightly longer fingers, they possess exceptional psychic sensitivity. Despite their intriguing traits, they are sterile, adding to their enigmatic existence as aliens.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Hybrid Sectoids are aliens with a blend of Zephyr, Vorix, and human features. With big black eyes, green slime blood, and heightened psychic sensitivity, they possess a captivating and enigmatic presence.
